title: Void Lux
body:
http://leaguememe.com/images/D743mPKiMZOI50XxoBdCeyJRhH82LQs96VpSWnqE.jpg

I came across this lovely skin concept for Lux. I am not sure who the creator was unfortunately.

Rito you need to make this happen!

replies.body: I like the idea, but this is trying too hard to be sexy and not trying hard enough to be EEEVVVIIILLL :)

> I like the idea, but this is trying too hard to be sexy and not trying hard enough to be EEEVVVIIILLL :)

This
A thong? really?
I dont see this thong you speak of.

Well it qualifies for the minimum amount of skin needed to be showing for a official LOL skin. None of it looks to originate from the void though. Most void skins change the physical appearance of the champ not just their cloths.
League has plenty of dark sexualized female characters, so I do not see what a skin like this would accomplish for Lux. It makes her feel more generic.
As I said in the previous Void Lux thread, while a dark b themed skin should happen, we still need a brighter themed skin for her after three military skins in a row.
Is it really that hard to search "Void Lux" into google and click the first link for credit? Here's who made it: http://cmorilla.deviantart.com/art/Void-Lux-470197532
As impressed as I am, I don't think that the purple particles of the Void Mages will fit her skills.

Unfortunately, keep wishing. Riot has systematically ignored the lux fan-base about the skin we were promised to make amends for the SLL fiasco. I wish something like this could come true, or any of the other half dozen or so GOOD Lux skin themes. She is a champion perfectly suited for a Halloween skin, and alas, we will only get another military themed skin.

I personally like SLL.

But yes, she has too many military skins.  Could use something to accent her girlish charm.
Legendary skin Rito plz
Just imagine her laser as a giant void-blast.  Oh, and her laugh with the Void reverb.

Oh god.

No.  NO.  NO DON'T KILL ME.

*head explodes*

Sorry bro all i see is Omega Pyrrha

(http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120205155405/soulcalibur/images/0/05/Sc5-pyrrha-omega.jpg)

Ehh, this would be a Noxus skin just add some red colors. If you want a void skin (creepy monsters) then make her eyes all black, give her a purple/dark grey/blue skin and replace this cute haircut with a white/black messy one.

eyes all black yes, i vote to have like purple/dark grey veins running through her flesh to make it look like she was corrupted by the void vs a creature from it (Think Malzahar meets Lux vs Void Fizz style Lux)

^ 

Plus a massive Syndra - like final spark

gah Yes and No at the same time, Yes because it looks sick (although the butt cape could be a tad longer to give her a better rear profile), and no because Lux is one of the biggest pains in the butt to fight mid because she can get ahead so easy, one kill and after her next back her R can take half-2/3s of your HP in one cast. Only other thing I would change is give her kinda more a Jinx face, you know a crazy, kill you all while laughing myself breathless kinda face with glowing Void Eyes, or the gem on her forehead glowing

Final Spark is terrifying enough as it is, a skin that makes it even scarier is something I want and fear at the same time. Just imagine going about your game and just all of a sudden a dark, saturated Final Spark shows up out of nowhere with Lux having some global "DEMACIA" and twisted laugh.
I want this
I'd buy it.
yes
This skin looks like Lux and Goth Annie went shopping at Hot Topic together.
BUMP

Oh, my God, YES!
Screw that stupid chearleader skin.
